description:
Our award winning 'Best of in Category' service offers more than the standard telephone answering service; we remove the unnecessary aggro so you can focus on your own business. With 80% of prospects hanging up when they hear a recorded message, our company set out to provide an established and award winning service for businesses, always there for customers and always delivering the best. We achieved this and are looking for new businesses like yours.
In the last few years, AnswerMyPhone.biz has evolved into the best service of its kind providing excellence across Wales and England. Our key aim has always been to make your customers feel as if they are speaking to a member of your team. We achieve this by taking a personal approach to your business needs, getting to know it and becoming accustomed to what your company stands for. This individual approach is completely unique and sets us apart from our main competitors now and for the foreseeable future. This is underlined with the fact that 98% of people who take advantage of our 2 week free trial, become clients.
